content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STLMSActivityDetail') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLMSActivityDetail
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLMSActivityDetail (
[lms_activity_transid] int,
[lms_activity_date] date,
[lms_activity_billcustid] int,
[lms_activity_billcustname] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_activity_movementtype] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_activity_linehualbookingid] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_activity_location] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_activity_aggrweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrchargeweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrvolweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrvolumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrmaxweight] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrnoparcels] bigint,
[lms_activity_aggrweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrvolweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel] numeric(18,2),
[lms_activity_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel] bigint,



	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/FINANCE/stactivitydetail.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STLMSActivityDetail 
GO
